subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Day, who was felled by vertigo just a day before, sank a birdie putt on No. 18 that tied him with Jordan Spieth, Dustin Johnson and Branden Grace at four-under par headed into the final day of the U.S. Open.
snippet: Day, who was felled by vertigo just a day before, sank a birdie putt on No. 18 that tied him with Jordan Spieth, Dustin Johnson and Branden Grace at four-under par headed into the final day of the U.S. Open.
